text: ME and my friend plan to found an NGO in order to advocate some diseases and do charities. We wonder, does an NGO needed to register to ROS or not. What're the requirement to form a proper and legit NGO? Thank you

Gov have allocation for NGO. if you register as NGO, can get money from BN gov, even your NGO is oppo leaning, but you can never get money from oppo unless you are oppo leaning because oppo politician are evil. Heck, even some area in Penang and Selongor got no free Internet because few ppl happened to live there.So make sure you register and your NGO appear like oppo leaning, so can makan both side.
Apa kebodohan kevavian ni.Dah la NGO why need to drag politik into this.
